definition: website
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
mirror (computing)

sentences.english: Different teams work on the Bolivia site and the Brazil site.
sentences.chinese: 玻利维亚站点和巴西站点由不同的团队负责。

sentences.english: Different teams work on the Bolivia site and the Brazil site.
sentences.chinese: 玻利维亚站点和巴西站点由不同的团队负责。

sentences.english: Which areas of the site are they visiting before they make a purchase?
sentences.chinese: 他们在做出购买之前访问了站点的哪些区域？

sentences.english: You can also embed the panorama in your own website.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以将全景图嵌入你的站点。

sentences.english: All the sites I chose for this article broke new ground in this area.
sentences.chinese: 本文中挑选的所有站点都在业内开拓了新天地。

sentences.english: Thoughts are visitors, who visit the central station of the mind.
sentences.chinese: 想法是来大脑中央站点串门的门客。

sentences.english: The site is an authority in its niche.
sentences.chinese: 网站在其所处行业是权威站点。

sentences.english: Now try to install the update site embedded with the signed plug-in.
sentences.chinese: 现在，尝试通过带签名的插件安装嵌入的更新站点。

sentences.english: 'Location and traffic network' shows 3 stations in the town center. Please clarify.
sentences.chinese: 交通区位图里表示了城镇中心有3个站点，请说明。

sentences.english: You can download free electronic copies of all of his books at this site.
sentences.chinese: 您可以从此站点免费下载他所有书籍的电子版。

sentences.english: Perform replication indirectly through the Inter-Site Messaging Service.
sentences.chinese: 通过站点间消息服务间接执行复制操作。

sentences.english: When you select a station, the map zooms in, and ashort message pops up.
sentences.chinese: 当你选到一个站点，地图被放大，一条短消息被弹出。

sentences.english: Immediately, any sites I link to are pinged about my new post.
sentences.chinese: 瞬间我链接的站点都Ping到了这篇新文章。

sentences.english: Conversely , you can also point forum readers to the main pages of your site.
sentences.chinese: 反之，你也可以点论坛读者主要页你的站点。

sentences.english: The designer framework calls this method when it's looking for a service implementation on a site.
sentences.chinese: 设计器框架在站点上查找服务实现时调用该方法。
